overview: Follows three social outcasts -- two geeks and a cynic -- as they attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum in the middle of a British pub. Faris plays a girl from the future who sets the adventure in motion.
original_title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
tagline: Three guys. One pub. Too much time on their hands.
cast: Chris O'Dowd|Dean Lennox Kelly|Marc Wootton|Anna Faris|Meredith MacNeill
